description:
Get ready for classic paddle-based gameplay as CommanderVideo returns to the source. Enjoy new challenges presented within the familiar paddle-based gameplay which started the phenomenon known as BIT.TRIP.
- New power-ups including the full-screen paddle!
- New beat types including Avoid Blobs!
- Easy, medium, and hard difficulty modes
- 20 bite-sized challenges separate from the main game
- Classic BIT.TRIP BEAT gameplay upgraded with the all-new Meta Mode!
- Bit Shifter returns as the chiptune guest star!
name: BIT.TRIP FLUX
